item.title: Hello World
item.description: Let’s do this I’ve had a lot of websites over the years, ranging from more or less official business endeavours like a small record label to more private things like a website for my wedding a while ago. I’ve never had a website just for me though, so this is something new. Also, I’ve never been involved much with giving back to the crowd - meaning all the people posting content like reviews or code snippets online.
